tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tasks ( 
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    task_name VARCHAR(50), 
    robot_id INT, 
    start_time TIMESTAMP, 
    end_time TIMESTAMP, 
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES robots(robot_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE robot_details (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturing_date DATE,
    energy_source VARCHAR(50),
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  robot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL,
  datetime TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE energy_efficiency (
  robot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  efficiency_rating INT,
  efficiency_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE robot_details (
  robot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  production_year INT,
  weight DECIMAL,
  length DECIMAL,
  height DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE robot_usage (
  robot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  usage_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Robots (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    efficiency DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Sensors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    robot_id INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    power_consumption DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);
